attributes.action: Be part of the EU scheme to get the medical equipment to defeat coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: We have to use all available resources to fight this pandemic, and not let Brexit decide whether people live or die. Therefore, the government must join the EU scheme as it is crucial to ensuring we can cope with this pandemic and that as few lives as possible are lost.
attributes.background: Our government has risked lives by refusing the offer to join this EU scheme to bulk buy ventilators and protective equipment for doctors using the 500 million person leverage that the EU's single market has globally. We must join this to save people's lives.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305825

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
